tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to overly permissive cross-domain whitelisting. When the `corsOrigins` environment variable is set to `*`, it allows requests from any origin, bypassing intended security restrictions and exposing the application to potential Cross-site Request Forgery (CSRF) or data theft attacks.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `uppy` library to the patch version.
